name: Guillermo Sanchez
bio: I am a UC Irvine student studying B.S. in Business Information Management. I come from a small town in Mexico, where there is a great lack of opportunities for youth to show their talent in the field of tech.

name: Nikhil Vytla
school: University of North Carolina, Chapel Hill
bio: I'm a junior at UNC Chapel Hill double majoring in Computer Science and Statistics! I'm passionate about ethical AI and building tech for social good, especially in expanding equitable access to education and healthcare.
